title: UPDATE: Things are going phenomenally...I just wanted to give an update to some of the details of our...

object.content:
UPDATE: Things are going phenomenally...I just wanted to give an update to some of the details of our business operations recently.

ChasSEO has been exploding with business...I'd have to guess that we are pushing out between 5 - 10 websites a week.  I never though we would be this busy.

Things are pretty insane, but our team has been handling everything admirably.  We are quickly becoming a major contender in SEO / Website design / Internet Marketing, and systematizing everything we do. We are constantly hiring quality talent, and expanding rapidly; our biggest problem has been that we never have ENOUGH people, despite the fact we are constantly hiring.

Our #1 goal with our company has been, and always will be, to make businesses succeed to their full potential; giving them more customers than they can handle.  

Our greatest wish is to bring success and wealth to people like you, with families like yours.  

We strive to provide effective methods for residual income, and continuity; profits rolling in, and freedom rolling out. We have been implementing methods that no one else has, and focusing on driving quality content and programmatic search engine optimization techniques. 

I wish you all the best, and hope you have an amazing weekend.

Stay tuned for updates, promotions, and gifts that we will be giving away very soon.

--Jason
